Pre-Game Insights: Charlotte will aim to end its five-game road losing streak when the Hornets face Cleveland.Cleveland ranks sixth in the Eastern Conference with 16.0 fast break points per game led by Donovan Mitchell averaging 3.6.The Cavaliers average 16.4 made 3-pointers per game this season, 2.7 more made shots on average than the 13.7 per game the Hornets allow.The Hornets are 6-23 in Eastern Conference play and are fourth in the NBA with 12.8 offensive rebounds per game led by Moussa Diabate averaging 3.1.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is described as Charlotte's attempt to end a five-game road losing streak.Cleveland's strong performance in conference matchups is highlighted.Key player performances, including Donovan Mitchell and LaMelo Ball, are mentioned.Injuries for both teams are noted, which could impact the game.Recent performance context from the last 10 games is provided.
